nodes.text: Pepe Larraz (born January 23, 1981) is a Spanish comic book artist, illustrator for press and advertising, and character designer. As of 2014, Larraz has been working in Marvel Comics for four years, in titles that include The Mighty Thor, Wolverine and the X-Men, and Ultimate Comics: Spider-Man.

Larraz was the main penciler for Marvel's comic series Star Wars: Kanan, written by Greg Weisman. He has also provided a variant cover to the first issues of the Vader Down crossover event, the Poe Dameron series, and the Han Solo miniseries, as well as to Star Wars Special: C-3PO 1.
